estimateAccruedTip().details: This function performs a calculation without changing the contract's state

returns._0: The estimated amount of accrued tips in the underlying asset's smallest unit
The Unix timestamp of when tips were last accrued
The address where accrued tips are sent

tipRate().details: A tip rate of 100 represents 1%, 10000 represents 100%

returns._0: The current tip rate using the Percentage type

estimateAccruedTip().notice: Estimate the amount of tips accrued since the last tip accrual

lastTipTimestamp().notice: Get the timestamp of the last tip accrual

tipJar().notice: Get the current tip jar address
